title: 添加匠魂崩溃，求大佬帮忙看下
author: LoganSKY
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// There are four lights!

Time: 18-1-3 下午4:54
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

replies.author: 错的是我
replies.txt_content:
匠魂和一些mod不兼容，推荐使用匠魂整合包：
[1.7.10][天堂/海岛/空岛/匠魂/无中生有]想去挑战世界生存吗？：
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-724478-1-1.html
[1.7.10]史上最完整的神秘时代整合包——神秘之旅[魔法/拔刀/科技/林业/匠魂]：
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-553665-1-1.html
